bibl.title: The Mezuzah of the Egyptological Collection of the Hungarian Museum of Fine Arts.
bibl.note: Budapest, Museum of Fine Arts, Inv. 50.135 A. Ceramic inscribed amulet. Provenance not known, Coptic period. - S.E.G. XVIII, 721.
bibl.seg: Scheiber Alexander, The Mezuzah of the Egyptological Collection of the Hungarian Museum of Fine Arts.
